summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Portfolio Binder Phase 1 feature. All core functionality working correctly including 3 default profiles, PDF generation, download/view capabilities, and frontend integration. Fixed critical WeasyPrint dependency issue.

resolved_issues.issue: PDF generation failing due to missing WeasyPrint dependency

minor_issues.issue: Returns 422 instead of 400 for validation errors
minor_issues.impact: Cosmetic - FastAPI correctly returns 422 for validation errors

ui_bugs.impact: Users can't modify profile settings via UI

passed_tests: POST /api/binder/generate creates binder and generates PDF
GET /api/binder/latest returns most recent completed binder
GET /api/binder/runs/{id}/view returns PDF for inline viewing
GET /api/binder/stale-check detects if binder is out of date
Binder link visible in sidebar under TOOLS section
Profile selection UI displays three profile cards (Audit, Court, Omni)
Generate Binder button triggers PDF generation successfully
View and Download buttons work correctly
Binder history sidebar shows completed runs
Error handling works for missing portfolio ID
